::Battera::

She looked up again and saw the huge red bird-like creature.  She wasn't 
sure what is was, but she wanted to check it out.  She flew up and became 
level with it.  She was sligtly behind it.  She moved forward and looked at 
it.  It looked like a huge flying lizard.
"Hello there.  Who are you? If I may be so bold as to ask?"
